D* Supplies and Expenses:
This includes the usual expenses of office materials and expenses as well as
reimbursement to cooperating institutions, when necessary, for the costs of films
and other materials, special seminar reports and others not available from other
sources. (Some such materials are also listed as a part of workshop expenses
in items 3 and 4 above.) For the Coordinator's office and the project, per year:
$5,000. There is some possibility of reduction of this item in the second and
third years of the project, below the sum shown, although such a reduction is
not yet indicated below, pending further investigation.
E. Travel:
Of the Coordinator and in some cases other NAEB officials as required for im¬
plementing this project, per year: $3,500.
